News.Title: RBI Governor Proposes Lifting VRR Limit
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor proposes removing the existing 2.5 trillion INR ceiling on the Voluntary Retention Route, potentially expanding foreign investment access in Indian markets.

News.Title: RBI Governor Proposes Higher MSME Loan Limits
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor suggests increasing unsecured loan limits for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises to ₹2 million to enhance credit accessibility for small businesses.

News.Title: RBI Governor Forecasts CPI at 4% in Q1, 4.2% in Q2
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor provides inflation outlook with Consumer Price Index projected at 4.00% for Q1 and 4.20% for Q2, indicating monetary policy expectations for upcoming quarters.

News.Title: RBI Governor Forecasts 4% CPI Inflation in Q1 FY27
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor provides forward guidance on consumer price inflation trajectory, projecting CPI inflation to reach 4% target in the first quarter of fiscal year 2027.

News.Title: RBI Governor Projects CPI Inflation At 3.2% In Q4 FY26
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor announces inflation projection of 3.2% for the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2026, indicating monetary policy outlook for the Indian economy.

News.Title: RBI Revises FY26 Inflation Forecast to 2.1%
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor updates Consumer Price Index inflation projection for FY26 to 2.1%, marking an upward revision from the previous estimate of 2.0%.

News.Title: RBI Revises GDP Growth Estimates for Q1, Q2
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor announces revised GDP growth figures of 6.9% for Q1 and 7% for Q2, reflecting updated economic assessments for the Indian economy.

News.Title: RBI Sets Marginal Standing Facility Rate at 5.50%
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India Governor announces the Marginal Standing Facility rate at 5.50%, providing clarity on the central bank's monetary policy stance for financial institutions.

News.Title: Indian Banks Seek RBI Liquidity Rule Relaxation
News.Summary: Indian lenders have approached the Reserve Bank of India requesting relaxation of liquidity rules to unlock funds parked for short-term financial stress requirements, aiming to free up capital for growth initiatives.

News.Title: Bank of India Redeems Rs 750 Crore AT1 Bonds
News.Summary: Bank of India exercised call option to fully redeem 9.04% Additional Tier I Bonds Series VI worth Rs 750 crores on January 28, 2026, paying principal plus Rs 56.10 crore broken period interest.

News.Title: Bank of India Q3FY26 Results Show Strong Growth
News.Summary: Bank of India reported robust Q3FY26 performance with 13.63% YoY growth in global advances to Rs.7,40,314 crore and 7% increase in net profit to Rs.2,705 crore, while maintaining improved asset quality.

News.Title: India bond yields hit 11-month high on supply concerns
News.Summary: India's benchmark 10-year bond yield surged to 6.7194%, highest since March 4, driven by heavy state borrowing of 398 billion rupees and tight liquidity despite RBI's $23 billion injection plan.

News.Title: Bank of India Appoints New Company Secretary
News.Summary: Bank of India announces appointment of Smt. Usha Ramsinghani as Company Secretary effective 28.01.2026, replacing Shri Rajesh V. Upadhya who has been transferred to Zonal Audit Office, Hyderabad.

News.Title: PSU banks offer compelling value in BFSI space
News.Summary: Bank of India Mutual Fund CIO Alok Singh highlights PSU banks as attractive investment opportunities, citing cheap valuations and improving efficiency amid BFSI sector growth prospects.

News.Title: Banks Closed Today: Fourth Saturday Holiday
News.Summary: Bank branches remain closed today, January 24, as it falls on the fourth Saturday of the month, observed as a weekly holiday under RBI norms across the country.

News.Title: RBI Announces Third Liquidity Tranche as Rupee Hits Low
News.Summary: RBI unveils ₹50,000 crore OMO purchases and ₹25,000 crore VRR operation as rupee touches record low of 91.97 against dollar amid FII outflows worth ₹36,587 crore in 2025.

News.Title: Central Bank Plans Ops Continuity During Strike
News.Summary: Central Bank of India prepares to maintain smooth operations as union announces one-day strike scheduled for January 27, 2026, ensuring minimal disruption to banking services.

News.Title: Banks Closed Jan 26 for Republic Day Holiday
News.Summary: All banks across India will remain closed on January 26 for Republic Day, creating a three-day weekend. ATMs and digital banking services will continue operating normally during the closure.

News.Title: RBI injects ₹1.25 trillion to ease cash crunch
News.Summary: Reserve Bank announces multiple liquidity measures including 90-day repo operations, USD swaps, and government securities purchases to address tightening banking system conditions over coming weeks.

News.Title: RBI dollar sales hit $43.2bn amid rupee volatility
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India's net dollar sales reached $43.2 billion till November, exceeding FY25 levels by 28% as rupee remains volatile against USD amid challenging balance of payments.

News.Title: India to remain fastest-growing major economy: RBI
News.Summary: RBI's January bulletin projects India's GDP growth at 7.4% for 2025-26, maintaining its position as the world's fastest-growing major economy despite global geopolitical tensions and trade uncertainties.

News.Title: RBI sells $9.7bn in Nov to support rupee amid decline
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India net sold $9.7 billion in November, down from $11.8 billion in October, as rupee depreciated 0.7%. Real effective exchange rate dropped to 94.20 in December from 96.17 in November.

News.Title: Bank of India Q3FY26 Results: Net Profit Grows 7.47%
News.Summary: Bank of India reported Q3FY26 net profit of ₹2,705 crores, up 7.47% YoY. Global business crossed ₹16 lakh crores milestone with advances growing 13.63% YoY. GNPA ratio improved to 2.26%.

News.Title: RBI conducts USD/INR swaps across multiple maturities
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India executed buy-sell USD/INR foreign exchange swaps for spot over June, July, August and October maturities to manage liquidity amid rupee pressure.

News.Title: India bonds gain on RBI buying hopes
News.Summary: Indian government bonds rose early Wednesday as traders expect RBI secondary market purchases and additional open market operations. The benchmark 10-year bond yield dipped to 6.6658% from 6.6722%.

News.Title: RBI tightens PSL norms, mandates auditor certification
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India strengthens priority sector lending compliance by requiring external auditor certificates from intermediary lenders to prevent duplicate claims by multiple banks.

News.Title: RBI Governor Urges UCBs to Strengthen Governance
News.Summary: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra emphasized strong governance standards for urban cooperative banks at Mumbai meeting, highlighting their role in financial inclusion and need for robust risk management practices.

News.Title: Axis Bank CEO warns on deposit-credit growth gap
News.Summary: Axis Bank's CEO Amitabh Chaudhry highlights the unsustainable divergence between deposit growth at 10-12% and expected credit growth of 15-17%, calling for enhanced RBI liquidity support to maintain banking system stability.

News.Title: Central Bank of India Sets Record Date for Third Dividend
News.Summary: Central Bank of India announces record date of January 23, 2026 for third interim dividend of ₹0.20 per share (2% on face value of ₹10) for FY26, with shares trading at ₹38.34.

News.Title: RBI Proposes BRICS Digital Currency Linkage Plan
News.Summary: India's central bank recommends connecting BRICS digital currencies for cross-border payments at 2026 summit, potentially reducing US dollar dependence amid rising geopolitical tensions.

News.Title: RBI flags PSL gaps at HDFC, ICICI banks
News.Summary: Reserve Bank directs HDFC Bank to provision ₹500 crore and ICICI Bank ₹1,283 crore for priority sector lending compliance issues in agriculture portfolios following supervisory reviews.

News.Title: Bank of India Q3FY26 Earnings Call Set for Jan 21
News.Summary: Bank of India has scheduled an earnings call with analysts and investors on January 21, 2026, at 6:30 PM to discuss its unaudited financial results for Q3FY26 ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Central Bank of India Q3 Interest Income Rises 6.24% YoY
News.Summary: Central Bank of India reports Q3 interest earned of ₹90.30 billion, up from ₹85.00 billion year-on-year, showing 6.24% growth alongside previous strong profit performance.

News.Title: RBI strengthens customer grievance redressal norms
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India issues new guidelines to strengthen internal grievance mechanisms for banks and NBFCs, mandating review processes before complaint rejection and enhanced internal ombudsman roles.

News.Title: RBI tightens forex risk norms, aligns with global standards
News.Summary: RBI issues new banking rules for calculating capital charges on foreign exchange risk, requiring continuous computation at consolidated and standalone levels. Changes effective April 1, 2027.

News.Title: RBI gives nod to Sumitomo Mitsui Banking for WOS
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India grants in-principle approval to Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation to set up wholly-owned subsidiary through conversion of existing branches in India.

News.Title: RBI's ECL Framework to Transform Banking Risk Management
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India introduces Expected Credit Loss framework from April 2027, replacing incurred-loss model with forward-looking provisioning approach aligned to global IFRS 9 standards.

News.Title: RBI proposes new norms for urban co-op bank licences
News.Summary: RBI's working group suggests ₹300 crore minimum capital and 12% capital adequacy ratio for new urban cooperative banking licences after two-decade pause. 1,457 UCBs currently operate with 82 under restrictions.

News.Title: RBI's $10bn forex swap draws $29.9bn in bids
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India's 3-year dollar-rupee swap attracted nearly three times the notified amount in bids, with cutoff premium rising to 728 paise amid rupee pressure.

News.Title: RBI Expected to Hold Repo Rate at 5.25% in February
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India likely to maintain current interest rates as inflation shows upward trend with December CPI at 1.33%. Central bank may focus on liquidity support through open market operations.

News.Title: RBI: UPI User Base Could Reach 1 Billion Users
News.Summary: RBI Deputy Governor T Rabi Sankar announced UPI's potential growth from 400 million to 1 billion users. Digital payment transactions surged from ₹2,071 crore in FY18 to ₹22,831 crore in FY25 with 41% CAGR.

News.Title: RBI Governor Outlines Economic Vision In Exclusive Q&A
News.Summary: Governor Sanjay Malhotra discusses inflation targeting, rupee policy, and central bank independence in comprehensive interview covering India's economic outlook and monetary policy framework.

News.Title: RBI Governor Defends Central Bank Independence
News.Summary: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra emphasizes importance of central bank autonomy amid US Federal Reserve turmoil and criminal probe against Chair Jerome Powell.

News.Title: RBI Governor Emphasizes Consumer Satisfaction Priority
News.Summary: Governor Sanjay Malhotra highlights citizen satisfaction as RBI's ultimate success benchmark, announcing digital reforms and streamlined processes for banking services and grievance redressal.

News.Title: RBI Governor Explains India's Low Inflation Drivers
News.Summary: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra outlines three key factors behind India's sustained low inflation: softer food prices due to base effects, flexible inflation targeting regime, and supply-side actions.

News.Title: RBI Buys ₹5 Lakh Crore Bonds to Control Rates
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India purchased government securities worth over ₹5 lakh crore through open market operations since April 2025 to maintain adequate liquidity and control lending rates in the financial system.

News.Title: India's Goldilocks Economy Shows Policy Harmony
News.Summary: India maintains low inflation with rapid growth as monetary-fiscal policy coordination contrasts sharply with US institutional tensions between Fed and White House.

News.Title: Banks Open Today Despite Lohri Celebrations
News.Summary: All public and private banks across India remain operational on January 13, 2026, despite Lohri celebrations in northern regions. RBI calendar confirms no bank holiday scheduled for the festival.

News.Title: RBI injects ₹50,000 cr via OMO amid strong demand
News.Summary: Reserve Bank conducts open market operations with participants bidding ₹1.22 lakh crore against ₹50,000 crore offered. Another ₹50,000 crore OMO scheduled for January 22.

News.Title: RBI Bars Residents From Guaranteeing NRI Credit
News.Summary: Reserve Bank of India introduces new FEMA regulations prohibiting resident Indians from issuing credit guarantees to non-resident Indians, with specific exemptions for authorized dealer banks.
